entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
